title: Gift card
body: Hi everyone I just got a MacDonald's gift card 20$ and i wanna use it to buy RP But there isnt such thing in the gift card options. Is there a way i can do it with the gift card or i should just refund it ?

replies.body: Open Bucks are limited to a few stores and regions, per our [Gift Card guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753254-Cash-and-Gift-Cards-Openbucks-).  I'm not sure that this particular one is eligible for Open Bucks, but hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) just in case our billing team can work something out with you.  I mean, that's a lot of hashbrowns and mcnuggets after all.  :)
